content: bring some handmade charm to your christmas tree this year with crochet granny sweater ornaments stitched in red heart super saver these colorful decorations can be customized in any colors that enhance your holiday decor it s a great small project for mastering basic techniques like chain double_crochet slip_stitch and more use up leftover lengths of yarn too materials red heart® super saver® super craft kit™ set includes 12 balls 50 g/1 7 oz each 600 g/21 oz total yardage 85 m/93 yds each 1020 m/1116 yds total contrast a black 1 ball or 35 yds/32 m contrast b jade 1 ball or 19 yds/17 m contrast c pumpkin 1 ball or 23 yds/21 m contrast d spring green 1 ball or 15 yds/14 m contrast e saffron 1 ball or 15 yds/14 m measurement approx 4 10 cm tall excluding hanging loop
